recipesJson.name: Orange Glazed Marzipan
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is an marzipan cookie with sweet orange glaze. (Been trying to add black pepper to this recipe with no avail, yet)
This recipe is featured in article "ORANGE HEAD"
-> http://diyordievaping.com/2017/10/09/orange-head/

reviews.text: There's a fancy eatery about an hour from me that serves orange rolls for dessert whether you order them or not.  They're excellent, and I think this recipe is pretty close to those rolls.  Which is incredibly convenient for me because I've been trying to make them as a vape for 3 months now, lol.
